---

## Import clean sotu data

```{r}
sotu_df2 <- read_csv("./Exported_data/DFExport3.csv")
str(sotu_df2)
```

## Import econ data

```{r}
econ_df <- read_csv("Econ_Data_Import.csv")
str(econ_df)
```



## Join econ data

```{r}
all_data <- inner_join(sotu_df2, econ_df, by = "sotu_date")
str(all_data)
```
